author: John
title: Inches From Impact (15 GIFS)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
You’re about to see what has made Chive TV the fastest growing DOOH (Digital Out Of Home) platform in the world. CHIVE TV’s fantastically curated galleries are answering the question, What are you watching at bars if you’re not watching sports? 
Chive TV’s themed video galleries are not only wildly addicting, they also require no sound at all. Simply plug the Chive TV ROKU stick into your TV and your off. Best of all it’s FREE . 
Bars who have CHIVE TV keep their patrons in the barstools 1.8x longer than bars that don’t ( Wall Street Journal Article right here ) 
CHIVE TV has expanded beyond the bars, it’s now carried on all the giant screens on all 25 ships in the Royal Caribbean fleet as well as half the Subways in Texas. 
So if you’re a bar or restaurant owner/manager, or an outside the box thinker, and you want to stay miles ahead of the competition, simply email us and we’ll have your Chive TV ROKU stick delivered in just a couple days, completely free of charge. 
Enjoy a look at the technology that’s changing everything. Welcome to CHIVE TV … 2
